overview:
I am an entrepreneur, a designer, an artist, a personal trainer, a manager, and President of Life Preceptor, LLC.

It has only been 2 years since I left Big Gym, but it feels like a lifetime ago. Low wages, status quo, pesky management on my back… I made a decision; a decision to change my life for the betterment of myself and all of the Personal Trainers around me.

I guess it comes from my design background. Design school teaches you to keep a very critical eye; to analyze what can be improved. I believe designers will be the future business men of our generation. This is because we are going through a cultural shift. The business’ that will thrive will focus only on consumer needs and how to fill them.

I guess you can say I am a revolutionary. I strive to allow every American worker to have the same freedom in their service that I possess as an entrepreneur. I strive to create an environment absent of fear, where each person can focus on their service to others while maintaining security and achieving success.

Imperare sibi maximum imperium est.
